name: SUPER ICK
description:
A terrible disease called THE ICK is wiping out the galaxy's fish, and as a skilled fisherman with a huge backpack, you've taken it upon yourself to collect them all before they're gone forever. Traverse a densely packed open world galaxy, fishing on dozens of different planets and battling ferocious enemies on the trips between them. With over sixty fish to discover and mysterious upgrades to find, the world of SUPER ICK is packed with secrets, at the heart of which lies a difficult truth.

- COLLECT dozens of ALIEN FISH, each stranger than the last!

- EXPLORE over twenty PLANETS with unique characters and biomes!

- FIGHT through waves of enemy ships using your signature FISHING GUNS!

- UPGRADE your abilities, and gain NEW POWERUPS to aid you on your QUEST!

- Contains 2+ HOURS OF GAMEPLAY!
